content:
Customize the FlexCard-Based Claim 360 Component

Customize the OmniStudio FlexCards, Integration Procedures, and Omnistudio Data Mappers to suit your business needs.

To start using the FlexCard-based Claim 360 component, customize the OmniStudio FlexCards, Integration Procedures, and Data Mappers, and then configure the component in Lightning Experience.

Customize FlexCard-Based Claim 360 Using FlexCards
Show claim information with clickable actions that change based on the information entered by customizing the FlexCard components you want to add to record pages.

Customize FlexCard-Based Claim 360 by Using Integration Procedures
Customize integration procedures in OmniStudio.

Customize FlexCard-Based Claim 360 Using Data Mappers
Include policy and claim details from a third-party system by having your developer create an Apex class that makes the data available to FlexCard-based Claim 360, then customize Omnistudio Data Mappers to reference the Apex class.
title: Customizing Salesforce Insurance Components
